# Suggested Commands
- `npm install` — install Node.js dependencies.
- `npm run build` — compile TypeScript sources to `dist/`.
- `node dist/index.js --url http://localhost:8000 --anon-key <key>` — start the MCP server locally.
- `uvx --python python3.12 --from rag-agent-mcp rag-agent --host <host> --port <port> --api-key <key>` — manually check rag-agent connectivity (mirrors integration transport).
